Item.name: never
Item.description: Do not use as state at all.

Item.name: avoid
Item.description: Use as state, if it cannot be avoided (but only if variable appears differentiated and no other potential state with attribute default, prefer, or always can be selected).

Item.name: default
Item.description: Use as state if appropriate, but only if variable appears differentiated.

Item.name: prefer
Item.description: Prefer it as state over those having the default value (also variables can be selected, which do not appear differentiated).

Item.name: always
Item.description: Do use it as a state.

ScalarVariable.name: J1.a
ScalarVariable.description: Absolute angular acceleration of component (= der(w))

ScalarVariable.name: J1.stateSelect
ScalarVariable.description: Priority to use phi and w as states

ScalarVariable.name: J1.w
ScalarVariable.description: Absolute angular velocity of component (= der(phi))

ScalarVariable.name: J2.a
ScalarVariable.description: Absolute angular acceleration of component (= der(w))

ScalarVariable.name: J2.stateSelect
ScalarVariable.description: Priority to use phi and w as states

ScalarVariable.name: J2.w
ScalarVariable.description: Absolute angular velocity of component (= der(phi))

ScalarVariable.name: J3.a
ScalarVariable.description: Absolute angular acceleration of component (= der(w))

ScalarVariable.name: J3.stateSelect
ScalarVariable.description: Priority to use phi and w as states

ScalarVariable.name: J3.w
ScalarVariable.description: Absolute angular velocity of component (= der(phi))

ScalarVariable.name: J4.a
ScalarVariable.description: Absolute angular acceleration of component (= der(w))

ScalarVariable.name: J4.stateSelect
ScalarVariable.description: Priority to use phi and w as states

ScalarVariable.name: J4.w
ScalarVariable.description: Absolute angular velocity of component (= der(phi))

ScalarVariable.name: clutch1.Stuck
ScalarVariable.description: w_rel = 0 (forward sliding, locked or backward sliding)

ScalarVariable.name: clutch1.Unknown
ScalarVariable.description: Value of mode is not known

ScalarVariable.name: clutch1.a_relfric
ScalarVariable.description: Relative angular acceleration between frictional surfaces

ScalarVariable.name: clutch1.cgeo
ScalarVariable.description: Geometry constant containing friction distribution assumption

ScalarVariable.name: clutch1.f_normalized
ScalarVariable.description: Normalized force signal 0..1 (normal force = fn_max*f_normalized; clutch is engaged if > 0)

ScalarVariable.name: clutch1.free
ScalarVariable.description: true, if frictional element is not active

ScalarVariable.name: clutch1.locked
ScalarVariable.description: true, if w_rel=0 and not sliding

ScalarVariable.name: clutch1.lossPower
ScalarVariable.description: Loss power leaving component via heatPort (> 0, if heat is flowing out of component)

ScalarVariable.name: clutch1.mue0
ScalarVariable.description: Friction coefficient for w=0 and forward sliding

ScalarVariable.name: clutch1.peak
ScalarVariable.description: peak*mue_pos[1,2] = maximum value of mue for w_rel==0

ScalarVariable.name: clutch1.phi_nominal
ScalarVariable.description: Nominal value of phi_rel (used for scaling)

ScalarVariable.name: clutch1.sa
ScalarVariable.description: Path parameter of friction characteristic tau = f(a_relfric)

ScalarVariable.name: clutch1.startBackward
ScalarVariable.description: true, if w_rel=0 and start of backward sliding

ScalarVariable.name: clutch1.startForward
ScalarVariable.description: true, if w_rel=0 and start of forward sliding

ScalarVariable.name: clutch1.stateSelect
ScalarVariable.description: Priority to use phi_rel and w_rel as states

ScalarVariable.name: clutch1.tau0
ScalarVariable.description: Friction torque for w=0 and forward sliding

ScalarVariable.name: clutch1.tau0_max
ScalarVariable.description: Maximum friction torque for w=0 and locked

ScalarVariable.name: clutch1.w_relfric
ScalarVariable.description: Relative angular velocity between frictional surfaces

ScalarVariable.name: clutch1.w_small
ScalarVariable.description: Relative angular velocity near to zero if jumps due to a reinit(..) of the velocity can occur (set to low value only if such impulses can occur)

ScalarVariable.name: freqHz
ScalarVariable.description: frequency of sine function to invoke clutch1

ScalarVariable.name: step1.startTime
ScalarVariable.description: Output y = offset for time < startTime

ScalarVariable.name: step2.startTime
ScalarVariable.description: Output y = offset for time < startTime

ScalarVariable.name: torque.support.phi
ScalarVariable.description: Absolute rotation angle of the support/housing

ScalarVariable.name: torque.useSupport
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if support flange enabled, otherwise implicitly grounded
